sense.gloss: concealing one's talents, status, intentions, etc., maintaining a strict incognito, self-effacement
concealing one's talents, position, status, intentions, etc.
propensity to efface oneself, being prone to conceal one's talent
two books on the art of war in ancient China, the secrets (essence) of the art of war, secrets of successful life, precepts for living
bellows (of the) imperial harbor, Shinto Buddhist doctrines
